_meta.description: Keyword triggers for Pip. Match prefix + command (case-insensitive). Args after the command are passed to the action.

usage.description: Claude + Codex API usage (5h/7d utilization windows)
usage.command: echo '=== CLAUDE ===' && node /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace/scripts/check-claude-usage.cjs 2>/dev/null; echo '=== CODEX ===' && node /home/bill/.openclaw/workspace/scripts/check-codex-usage.cjs 2>/dev/null
usage.format: Parse both JSON outputs. Show Claude and Codex side by side: 5h and 7d utilization %, reset times, alert levels. If either >=90% warn to switch models.

codex.format: Parse JSON output. Report primary (5h) and secondary (7d) utilization %, plan type, credits balance, code review usage. If >=90% warn about rate limits.

claude.format: Parse JSON output. Report 5h and 7d utilization %, reset times, alert level. If >=90% warn to switch models.

weather.description: Current weather for Point Pleasant, NJ

car.format: Summarize key info: battery %, range, location, climate, lock state. For commands, confirm execution.

bank.format: Show account balances and recent notable transactions.

email.format: List unread emails with sender, subject, time. Flag urgent ones.

cal.format: List events for next 48h with time, title, location.

todo.format: List tasks with priorities, projects, and due times. Mention overdue count.

track.format: Show packages with latest status, location, and ETA if available.
